name: Lafayette Elementary School
description: Lafayette School provides a comprehensive curriculum that stresses academic excellence for the diverse student population. As a neighborhood school in the Outer Richmond area has served the community since 1927. In addition to general education students, there are students representing 23 language groups as well as students with special needs and pre-k through fifth grade hearing impaired students. Lafayette employ a multicultural curriculum that celebrates and honors the rich ethnic and cultura
